SELECT CC.L_CD , CC.M_CD AS CODE_ID , CC.FST_CRER_ID , IFNULL((SELECT USER_NM FROM CU_USER WHERE USER_ID = CC.FST_CRER_ID), CC.FST_CRER_ID) AS FST_CRER_NM , DATE_FORMAT(CC.FST_CRE_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i') AS FST_CRE_DTM , CC.AUDIT_ID , IFNULL((SELECT USER_NM FROM CU_USER WHERE USER_ID = CC.AUDIT_ID), CC.AUDIT_ID) AS AUDIT_NM , DATE_FORMAT(CC.AUDIT_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i') AS AUDIT_DTM , CC.CODE_NM , CC.SORT_SEQ , CC.REF1 , CC.REF2 , CC.REF3 , CC.ETC FROM CM_CODE CC WHERE 1 = 1 AND CC.M_CD = '*'
AND CC.L_CD LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
AND CC.CODE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
ORDER BY FST_CRER_ID DESC

SELECT CC.L_CD AS UPPER_CODE_ID , CC.M_CD AS CODE_ID , CC.FST_CRER_ID , IFNULL((SELECT USER_NM FROM CU_USER WHERE USER_ID = CC.FST_CRER_ID), CC.FST_CRER_ID) AS FST_CRER_NM , DATE_FORMAT(CC.FST_CRE_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i') AS FST_CRE_DTM , CC.AUDIT_ID , IFNULL((SELECT USER_NM FROM CU_USER WHERE USER_ID = CC.AUDIT_ID), CC.AUDIT_ID) AS AUDIT_NM , DATE_FORMAT(CC.AUDIT_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i') AS AUDIT_DTM , CC.CODE_NM , CC.SORT_SEQ , CC.REF1 , CC.REF2 , CC.REF3 , CC.ETC FROM CM_CODE CC WHERE 1 = 1 AND CC.L_CD = #{lCd} ORDER BY SORT_SEQ ASC, M_CD

SELECT CC.L_CD , CC.M_CD AS CODE_ID , CC.FST_CRER_ID , IFNULL((SELECT USER_NM FROM CU_USER WHERE USER_ID = CC.FST_CRER_ID), CC.FST_CRER_ID) AS FST_CRER_NM , DATE_FORMAT(CC.FST_CRE_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i') AS FST_CRE_DTM , CC.AUDIT_ID , IFNULL((SELECT USER_NM FROM CU_USER WHERE USER_ID = CC.AUDIT_ID), CC.AUDIT_ID) AS AUDIT_NM , DATE_FORMAT(CC.AUDIT_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i') AS AUDIT_DTM , CC.CODE_NM , CC.SORT_SEQ , CC.REF1 , CC.REF2 , CC.REF3 , CC.ETC FROM CM_CODE CC WHERE 1 = 1 AND CC.M_CD <> '*' AND CC.L_CD = #{lCd} ORDER BY SORT_SEQ ASC
